label.intro:
Welcome to

Theme Lambda for Moodle

The perfect choice for your Moodle site

With Theme Lambda for Moodle you can easily create a modern and eye-catching website for your learning environment. It offers various options and comes bundled with lots of easy to use features including tabs, slideshows, accordions, promotion boxes and scalable vector icons.
